description: Final output marker - the investment decision to be returned
natural_name: investment decision (投资决策)

description: Price data retrieved from market sources
natural_name: price data (价格数据)

description: News data retrieved from text sources
natural_name: news data (新闻数据)

description: Theoretical framework from domain experts
natural_name: theoretical framework (理论框架)

description: Investor constraints including risk tolerance, position size, stop-loss, and horizon
natural_name: investor risk profile (投资者风险偏好)

description: Unified signals from quantitative and narrative analysis plus theoretical framework
natural_name: validated signal (验证信号)

description: Price-based technical indicators
natural_name: quantitative signal (量化信号)

description: Sentiment and themes extracted from news
natural_name: narrative signal (叙事信号)

description: Truth mask: which signals exceed theoretical predictions (bullish)
natural_name: signals surpass theoretical expectations (信号超出理论预期)

description: Truth mask: which signals fall below theoretical predictions (bearish)
natural_name: signals deviate from theoretical expectations (信号偏离理论预期)

description: Truth mask: which signals are neither bullish nor bearish
natural_name: signals are neutral (信号中性)

description: Grouped truth markers (surpass + deviate) for neutral evaluation
natural_name: signal status (信号状态)

description: Final synthesized investment decision with action, rationale, and confidence
natural_name: investment decision (投资决策)

description: Collection of all recommendation branches (bullish, bearish, neutral)
natural_name: all recommendations (所有建议)

description: Buy recommendation with position sizing (filtered by bullish signals)
natural_name: bullish recommendation (看涨建议)

description: Sell recommendation with position sizing (filtered by bearish signals)
natural_name: bearish recommendation (看跌建议)

description: Hold recommendation (filtered by neutral signals)
natural_name: neutral recommendation (中性建议)

description: Ground concept: file path for simulated price data
natural_name: simulated data: price data (模拟数据：价格数据)

description: Ground concept: file path for simulated news data
natural_name: simulated data: news data (模拟数据：新闻数据)

description: Ground concept: file path for simulated theoretical framework
natural_name: simulated data: theoretical framework (模拟数据：理论框架)

description: Ground concept: file path for simulated investor risk profile
natural_name: simulated data: investor risk profile (模拟数据：投资者风险偏好)

description: Functional: specification assignment for final output
natural_name: investment decision (投资决策)

description: Functional: retrieve price data using file load paradigm
natural_name: retrieve price data from market sources (从市场来源获取价格数据)

description: Functional: retrieve news data using file load paradigm
natural_name: retrieve news data from text sources (从文本来源获取新闻数据)

description: Functional: obtain theoretical framework using file load paradigm
natural_name: obtain theoretical framework from domain experts (从领域专家获取理论框架)

concept_name: :%(composition):{paradigm}(collect investor constraints: {1}<$({risk tolerance})%>, {2}<$({max position size})%>, {3}<$({stop-loss rules})%>, {4}<$({investment horizon})%>)
description: Functional: collect investor risk profile using file load paradigm
reference_data: :%(composition):{paradigm}(collect investor constraints: {1}<$({risk tolerance})%>, {2}<$({max position size})%>, {3}<$({stop-loss rules})%>, {4}<$({investment horizon})%>)
natural_name: collect investor constraints: risk tolerance, max position size, stop-loss rules, investment horizon (收集投资者约束：风险承受能力、最大持仓、止损规则、投资期限)

description: Functional: grouping across to unify signals with per-reference collapse
natural_name: group of quantitative signal and narrative signal (量化信号和叙事信号组)

description: Functional: compute technical indicators via Python script
natural_name: compute price-based indicators from price data (根据价格数据计算价格指标)

description: Functional: extract sentiment via LLM prompt
natural_name: extract sentiment and themes from news data (从新闻数据提取情绪和主题)

concept_name: :%(composition):({1}<$({validated signal})%> exceeds predictions of {2}<$({theoretical framework})%>) <For Each {validated signal} True>
description: Functional judgement: evaluate if signals exceed theory (bullish)
natural_name: validated signal exceeds predictions of theoretical framework (验证信号超出理论框架预测)

concept_name: :%(composition):({1}<$({validated signal})%> falls below predictions of {2}<$({theoretical framework})%>) <For Each {validated signal} True>
description: Functional judgement: evaluate if signals fall below theory (bearish)
natural_name: validated signal falls below predictions of theoretical framework (验证信号低于理论框架预测)

description: Functional judgement: evaluate if signals are neutral (neither bullish nor bearish)
natural_name: signal status (信号状态)

concept_name: &[#] %>[<signals surpass theoretical expectations>, <signals deviate from theoretical expectations>] %^<$!={signal}>
description: Functional: grouping truth masks with signal axis protected (legacy mode)
reference_data: &[#] %>[<signals surpass theoretical expectations>, <signals deviate from theoretical expectations>] %^<$!={signal}>
natural_name: group of signals surpass theoretical expectations and signals deviate from theoretical expectations (信号超出理论预期和信号偏离理论预期组)

concept_name: :%(composition):(synthesize final decision from {1}<$([all recommendations])%> constrained by {2}<$({investor risk profile})%>)
description: Functional: synthesize final decision via LLM
natural_name: synthesize final decision from all recommendations constrained by investor risk profile (根据投资者风险偏好约束综合所有建议得出最终决定)

description: Functional: grouping recommendations into annotated dict with per-reference collapse
natural_name: bundle of bullish recommendation and bearish recommendation and neutral recommendation (看涨建议、看跌建议和中性建议包)

concept_name: :%(composition):(generate buy recommendation with position sizing from {1}<$({validated signal})%> and {2}<$({investor risk profile})%>)
description: Functional: generate buy recommendation via LLM
natural_name: generate buy recommendation with position sizing from validated signal and investor risk profile (根据验证信号和投资者风险偏好生成带仓位管理的买入建议)

description: Functional: timing gate for bullish branch
natural_name: signals surpass theoretical expectations (信号超出理论预期)

concept_name: :%(composition):(generate sell recommendation with position sizing from {1}<$({validated signal})%> and {2}<$({investor risk profile})%>)
description: Functional: generate sell recommendation via LLM
natural_name: generate sell recommendation with position sizing from validated signal and investor risk profile (根据验证信号和投资者风险偏好生成带仓位管理的卖出建议)

description: Functional: timing gate for bearish branch
natural_name: signals deviate from theoretical expectations (信号偏离理论预期)

description: Functional: generate hold recommendation via LLM
natural_name: generate hold recommendation from validated signal (根据验证信号生成持有建议)

description: Functional: timing gate for neutral branch
natural_name: signals are neutral (信号中性)
